charts.name: 5-day period Mean of all data points.

queries.query:
from(bucket: "wind_turbine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind_turbine_data")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

charts.name: Max Wind Speed of all data points

queries.query:
from(bucket: "wind_turbine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind_turbine_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_speed_mps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "wind_turbine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind_turbine_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "theoretical_power_kwh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max_theoretical_power")

from(bucket: "wind_turbine")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind_turbine_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_power_kw")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max_active_power")
